citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3 pm on
24-Sep-19.
Spoke to Mrs. Lapp at the facility, who indicated Mr. Lapp wouldn't be home until evening. We discussed hours of
availability. Mr. Lapp will call and leave a message for days he is unavailable.
